name: Breast of Chicken With Tarragon and Basil Cream (Ston Easton Park)
recipeIngredient: Salt and white pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Place chicken breasts in saute pan and cover with white wine, chicken stock and bay leaves. Cover and bring to boil. Turn chicken over and simmer about 8 to 10 miutes, until they are slightly undercooked. Remove.
Add basil and tarragon and bring mixture to boil, cooking until it is reduced by half. Add cream and bring to boil.
Return chicken to pot and cook slowly, reducing sauce until it is thick enough to coat chicken. Remove chicken breasts to plates and decorate with parsley and chopped tomato.
Correct seasoning in sauce and pour over chicken.
